verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> also to me, saying,

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> concerning<WH5921> the sons<WH1121> and concerning<WH5921> the daughters<WH1323> that are born<WH3205> in this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> and concerning<WH5921> their mothers<WH517> that bore<WH3205> them, and concerning<WH5921> their fathers<WH1> that begat<WH3205> them in this<WH2088> land;<WH776>

They shall die<WH4191> of grievous<WH8463> deaths;<WH4463> they shall not be lamented;<WH5594> neither<WH3808> shall they be buried;<WH6912> but they shall be as dung<WH1828> on the face<WH6440> of the earth:<WH127> and they shall be consumed<WH3615> by the sword,<WH2719> and by famine;<WH7458> and their carcasses<WH5038> shall be meat<WH3978> for the fowls<WH5775> of heaven,<WH8064> and for the beasts<WH929> of the earth.<WH776>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> Enter<WH935> not into the house<WH1004> of mourning,<WH4798> neither<WH3808> go<WH3212> to lament<WH5594> nor<WH3808> bemoan<WH5110> them: for I have taken<WH622> away my peace<WH7965> from this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> even<WH853> loving kindness<WH2617> and mercies.<WH7356>

Both the great<WH1419> and the small<WH6996> shall die<WH4191> in this<WH2063> land:<WH776> they shall not be buried,<WH6912> neither<WH3808> shall men lament<WH5594> for them, nor<WH3808> cut<WH1413> themselves, nor<WH3808> make themselves bald<WH7139> for them:

Neither<WH3808> shall men tear<WH6536> themselves for them in mourning,<WH60> to comfort<WH5162> them for the dead;<WH4191> neither<WH3808> shall men give them the cup<WH3563> of consolation<WH8575> to drink<WH8248> for their father<WH1> or for their mother.<WH517>
You shall not also go<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of feasting,<WH4960> to sit<WH3427> with them to eat<WH398> and to drink.<WH8354>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> Behold,<WH2005> I will cause to cease<WH7673> out of this<WH2088> place<WH4725> in your eyes,<WH5869> and in your days,<WH3117> the voice<WH6963> of mirth,<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness,<WH8057> the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom,<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride.<WH3618>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, when<WH3588> you shall show<WH5046> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words,<WH1697> and they shall say<WH559> to you, Why<WH5921> <WH4100> has the LORD<WH3068> pronounced<WH1696> all<WH3605> this<WH2063> great<WH1419> evil<WH7451> against<WH5921> us? or what<WH4100> is our iniquity?<WH5771> or what<WH4100> is our sin<WH2403> that we have committed<WH2398> against the LORD<WH3068> our God?<WH430>

Then shall you say<WH559> to them, Because<WH5921> <WH834> your fathers<WH1> have forsaken<WH5800> me, said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> and have walked<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and have served<WH5647> them, and have worshipped<WH7812> them, and have forsaken<WH5800> me, and have not kept<WH8104> my law;<WH8451>

And you have done<WH6213> worse<WH7489> than your fathers;<WH1> for, behold,<WH2009> you walk<WH1980> every<WH376> one<WH376> after<WH310> the imagination<WH8307> of his evil<WH7451> heart,<WH3820> that they may not listen<WH8085> to me:

Therefore will I cast<WH2904> you out of this<WH2063> land<WH776> into<WH5921> a land<WH776> that you know<WH3045> not, neither you nor your fathers;<WH1> and there<WH8033> shall you serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods<WH430> day<WH3119> and night;<WH3915> where<WH834> I will not show<WH5414> you favor.<WH2594>

Therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> the days<WH3117> come,<WH935> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that it shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> be said,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> that brought<WH5927> up the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714>

But, The LORD<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> that brought<WH5927> up the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from the land<WH776> of the north,<WH6828> and from all<WH3605> the lands<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> he had driven<WH5080> them: and I will bring<WH7725> them again<WH7725> into<WH5921> their land<WH127> that I gave<WH5414> to their fathers.<WH1>

Behold,<WH2005> I will send<WH7971> for many<WH7227> fishers,<WH1728> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> and they shall fish<WH1770> them; and after<WH310> will I send<WH7971> for many<WH7227> hunters,<WH6719> and they shall hunt<WH6679> them from every<WH3605> mountain,<WH2022> and from every<WH3605> hill,<WH1389> and out of the holes<WH5357> of the rocks.<WH5553>
For my eyes<WH5869> are on all<WH3605> their ways:<WH1870> they are not hid<WH5641> from my face,<WH6440> neither<WH3808> is their iniquity<WH5771> hid<WH6845> from my eyes.<WH5869>

And first<WH7223> I will recompense<WH7999> their iniquity<WH5771> and their sin<WH2403> double;<WH4932> because<WH5921> they have defiled<WH2490> my land,<WH776> they have filled<WH4390> my inheritance<WH5159> with the carcasses<WH5038> of their detestable<WH8251> and abominable<WH8441> things.

O LORD,<WH3068> my strength,<WH5797> and my fortress,<WH4581> and my refuge<WH4498> in the day<WH3117> of affliction,<WH6869> the Gentiles<WH1471> shall come<WH935> to you from the ends<WH657> of the earth,<WH776> and shall say,<WH559> Surely<WH389> our fathers<WH1> have inherited<WH5157> lies,<WH8267> vanity,<WH1892> and things wherein there is no<WH369> profit.<WH3276>
Shall a man<WH120> make<WH6213> gods<WH430> to himself, and they are no<WH3808> gods?<WH430>

Therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2005> I will this<WH2063> once<WH6471> cause them to know,<WH3045> I will cause them to know<WH3045> my hand<WH3027> and my might;<WH1369> and they shall know<WH3045> that my name<WH8034> is The LORD.<WH3068>
